Class CustomerService

java.lang.Object
com.example.lab9.service.CustomerService
@Service public class CustomerService extends Object
Service class for managing Customer entities. Provides business logic for creating, retrieving, and deleting customers.

      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Throws:
